fields.description:
{html}

on 3.1.x run the following:

var win = Ti.UI.createWindow();
var imageView = Titanium.UI.createImageView({
image: 'http://www.findlawactivitytracker.com/charts/display?image=contactS...,
top: 0,
left: 0,
width: 300,
height: 'auto'
}); win.add(imageView);
win.open()

image view is not position correctly

{html}
fields.summary: Image View rendering is jacked [REGRESSION ISSUE]

comments.body:
{html}

(from [92cb189ccb7ae7e2c506311cdf54316be997d364]) Closes #1186: Added back in some autosize code for image views that had been excised in the past. Some testing shows that none of the bugs which have been fixed since then are affected. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/92cb189ccb7ae...
